snippet: Former President Nicolas Sarkozy has sent a signal, through friends quoted in an article to be published on Thursday, of his supposedly reluctant willingness to return to politics.
abstract: Former French Pres Nicolas Sarkozy signals that he is willing to return to politics.
lead_paragraph: Former President Nicolas Sarkozy has sent a signal, through friends quoted in an article to be published on Thursday, of his supposedly reluctant willingness to return to politics.

headline.main: France: Sarkozy Dips a Toe Back In
headline.print_headline: France: Sarkozy Dips a Toe Back In
